title: Gimmick
lyrics:
Niga byeonhan geonji naega byeonhan geonji
Ulin gat-eun gos-eul bala bwass-eossneunde
Hibhab-ui daejunghwadeun mwodeun ssiba da pil-yo eobsji
Ije waseo mwoga deo jung-yohae
Ulin jonna ttala haeya doeji
Oegug laepeo deul-i haneun modeun geos-eul

FUCKIN’ da COPYCAT

Haneun mal-eun don yeoja cha jalang-e

Ajig jojbab-imyeon yeneunglaepeo da kkeojilane

Solkka malhae ni seutal-i mwonde

Solkka malhae wonhaneunge mwonde

Solkka malhae ni nolae nuga deul-eo

Solkka malhae syomippal-i eottaeseo

Syomi eobs-eoss-eumyeon neone don mos beol-eo

Daehag chugje da laebpan-inde

Bulman-eun jonnage manh-a jasingam-eun jjeol-eo

Neone bijeon-eun jeloinde

Oegug laepeodeul-i ibneun os

Oegug laepeodeul-i haneun mal

Oegug laepeodeul-i haneun taedo

Oegug laepeodeul-i haneun geulil

Gyaenedeul-i jjigneun myubi

Gyaene saieseo yuhaenghaneun ototyun

Kkaji ttala haeyaji

Meonjeo ttala hamyeon naekkeo doeneunde

Gyesog ttala hamyeon injeonghaejune

Nuga deo jal ttala hana daehoene

I DON’T WANNA BLAME

ALL THESE RAPPERS IN THE GAME

ALL THEY DID WAS TRY’NA EAT

CUZ THEY GOT MOUTHS TO FEED

I DON’T WANNA BLAME THO

BUT YOU GOTTA HAVE THE

RESPECT FOR THE GAME THO

I DON’T WANNA BLAME THO

BUT YOU GOTTA HAVE THE

RESPECT FOR THE GAME THO

Sasil 20nyeon jeonbuteo hyeongdeuldo migug-eul bekkyeossji

Saeng-gaghaebwa hibhab-eun migug geojanh-a eochapi

Naega hwaga naneun geon

I munhwana munhwaleul kiun nunana hyeongdeul

Nun hana kkamjjag eobs-i gimanhaneun geos STOP IT

Hibhab-i oneul yeogikkaji oge doen gajang keun him-eun

WITHOUT A DOUBT UNDOUBTEDLY RESPECT

Nae wie hyeongdeul-i jul-eul seossjimando

Aegideul-a saegyeola naega haneun mal

Modu da ni gaseumsog-eda gip-i

ALL THEM MUTHAFUCKAS

Da ppeokkeum daegiman bappa

Dekkowa da neokkeunhae byeongsin-a

THIS AIN’T MY TIME TO LEAVE

Aedo issjiman WHEN I GRAB THE MIC

STILL GOT THE KILLER INSTINCT

Juggi ttag joh-eun nalssiya palahne haneul-i

I GOT MY BROTHER’S BACK

Lipihyeong tteossne FINALLY

Lipihyeong-i tteudeon naega useung-eul haessgeon

Hangsang RIDE OR DIE TOGETHER

Nuguegen geujeo gat-eun keuluyeossdadeonji

Geuleon ge byeolgeo anil su issjiman

Nae gaseum-en jagug-i gipge paeeo issji

Igeol yatjab-aboneun saekkideul da mibge boine naegen

Jigeum-ui neol issge mandeun ge mwonji

Kkighaeya don-eul jogeum swibge beolge

Haneun geo ttaem-e ijge doen neoui ppuli

YOU A DOUCHE THAT’S A FACT

Hibhab-eun hangsang jalhago moshago

Guligo hashagolo mal-i manhji

Moshandaneungeon bunmyeonghi jonjaehaji

Injeonghae BUT seukil-ui yumu wie

Deo widaehan mwongaga issdaneun geon

Bunmyeonghae AND THAT’S A WRAP

Yeye nan hyeong yaegie

Eoneu jeongdo chungbunhi ihaeihaedwae

Naleul yeyelo deul-eo yaegihaebolge

Nae sigdaelo maeil keoseuteom hae nan laeb

Leseun daesin nae aipon

Ieopon an-e sumanh-eun laepeo

Deul-ui jagpum-e yeong-gam bad-a niga

Cheoeum bwass-eul geuleon jagpum-eulo bakkwo

Neul mobanghae nae jagbeob-e to daneun nom hanado eobsji waenya

Gyaenewa nae chaijeom-eul gubunhaneun

Bangbeob-eun saeng-gagboda swibji

Jeo kapiwa keobeoleul gubunhamyeon dwae

Neul balaewassgo jigeumdo

Yeojeonhi gat-a naega geulyeossdeon

Mitgeulim-e naekineun daelo saeg-eul ibhyeojwo

Ni bangsigdaelo nal keoseuteom

Nugungaui jageug-i doegileul naega

Nugungaui jageug-i doegileul

Geu nugungaga nae jageugdeul-igileul

Nugun i gog deudgo jageug jom deo badgileul

Gidaehago iss-eo i beolseu deudgo

Neukkil su issneun nom-i myeoch-ina dwae

Palloalto beisig＆seullipi

Geuligo nakkaji ulin deo ti nage

I teulaeg deul-eul ttae da beolyeo pyeongyeon ttawi

Jinjjala mid-eossdeon geosdeul-eun geojismal

ORIGINALITYeobs-i bekkyeodaen STYLE

Moleuneun aedeul sog-yeo don jom beollyeossna

Ulin da sihaengchag-o gyeokk-eun dwie seongjanghae

Geunde eotteon laepeodeul-eun ppeonppeonhane

Yesulgain cheog geu kkol-i bogi silhji

Geunyang migugbyeong-e geollin noye gimchi

Migug-eseo jeoldae an pallyeo

Ohilyeo bius-eumgeoli jjog-ina pallyeo

Hangug-eseo banjjag ingilo kkabchine

Gajja salm-eul gasa an-e dam-a jjachige

Teulendeu gyeou jjoch-a teulendihan cheog

Geugeon yeong-gambadneun geolang daleuji wanjeon

Machi seong-gonghan geoscheoleom pojang-eul deopne

Nam-ui geos billin geolaseo geu gog-e neon eobsne

Jalangseuleobji anh-a pyeongsaeng salanghadeon il-i

Gyeolgug don-i dain geonga sip-eun jubyeon-ui bun-wigi

Eonjenga tteol-eojil ingi

Geugeol ttwieoneomneun uimi chajneun geoji

Geuleon gwajeong-eseo geugbog jung-in wigi

Nan bukkeuleowossgie neukkyeo suojisim

Tteonage doel sungan-e geodulyeo hae yujong-ui mi

Su sseuneun geoji jag-eun badugpan wieseo

Almanhan geosdeul-i eodiseo yag-eul pal-a
